verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> [was] eight שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> Josiah בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וְאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> one שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and walked בְּדַרְכֵי֙ <S%H1870><s%> in the ways דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> and declined יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> [neither] to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> nor to the left

וּבִשְׁמוֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> For in the eighth שָׁנִ֜ים <S%H8141><s%> year לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still נַ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> while he was yet young הֵחֵ֕ל <S%H2490><s%> he began לִדְר֕וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> after the God דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וּבִשְׁתֵּ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> year הֵחֵל֙ <S%H2490><s%> he began לְטַהֵ֔ר <S%H2891><s%> to purge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> Judah וִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַבָּמוֹת֙ <S%H1116><s%> from the high places וְהָ֣אֲשֵׁרִ֔ים <S%H842><s%> and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֖ים <S%H6456><s%> and the carved images וְהַמַּסֵּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4541><s%> and the molten images

וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <S%H5422><s%> And they brake down לְפָנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> in his presence אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> מִזְבְּח֣וֹת <S%H4196><s%> the altars הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <S%H1168><s%> of Baalim וְהַֽחַמָּנִ֛ים <S%H2553><s%> and the images אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> were לְמַ֥עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> that [were] on high above them מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and גִּדֵּ֑עַ <S%H1438><s%> he cut down וְ֠הָאֲשֵׁרִים <S%H842><s%> and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִ֤ים <S%H6456><s%> and the carved images וְהַמַּסֵּכוֹת֙ <S%H4541><s%> and the molten images שִׁבַּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> he brake in pieces וְהֵדַ֔ק <S%H1854><s%> and made dust וַיִּזְרֹק֙ <S%H2236><s%> [of them] and strowed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [it] upon הַקְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H6913><s%> the graves הַזֹּבְחִ֖ים <S%H2076><s%> of them that had sacrificed לָהֶֽם׃

וְעַצְמוֹת֙ <S%H6106><s%> the bones כֹּֽהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests שָׂרַ֖ף <S%H8313><s%> And he burnt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [מִזְבְּחֹותָים כ] (מִזְבְּחֹותָ֑ם <S%H4196><s%> altar ק) וַיְטַהֵ֥ר <S%H2891><s%> and cleansed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem

וּבְעָרֵ֨י <S%H5892><s%> And [so did he] in the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וְאֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <S%H8095><s%> and Simeon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> even unto Naphtali [בָּהַר <S%H2719><s%> dagger כ] [בָּתֵּיהֶם כ] (בְּחַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> court ק) סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וַיְנַתֵּ֣ץ <S%H5422><s%> And when he had broken down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמִּזְבְּח֗וֹת <S%H4196><s%> the altars וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֤ים <S%H842><s%> and the groves וְהַפְּסִלִים֙ <S%H6456><s%> the graven images כִּתַּ֣ת <S%H3807><s%> and had beaten לְהֵדַ֔ק <S%H1854><s%> into powder וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַֽחַמָּנִ֥ים <S%H2553><s%> all the idols גִּדַּ֖ע <S%H1438><s%> and cut down בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> he returned לִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem ס

וּבִשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁמוֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign לְטַהֵ֥ר <S%H2891><s%> when he had purged הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְהַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the house שָׁ֠לַח <S%H7971><s%> he sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁפָ֨ן <S%H8227><s%> Shaphan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲצַלְיָ֜הוּ <S%H683><s%> of Azaliah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֣הוּ <S%H4641><s%> and Maaseiah שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the governor הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְ֠אֵת <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָ֤ח <S%H3098><s%> and Joah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֽוֹאָחָז֙ <S%H3099><s%> of Joahaz הַמַּזְכִּ֔יר <S%H2142><s%> the recorder לְחַזֵּ֕ק <S%H2388><s%> to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> his God

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ ׀ <S%H2518><s%> to Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the high וַֽיִּתְּנוּ֮ <S%H5414><s%> they delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּסֶף֮ <S%H3701><s%> the money הַמּוּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> that was brought בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house אֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָסְפֽוּ־ <S%H622><s%> had gathered הַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> which the Levites שֹׁמְרֵ֨י <S%H8104><s%> that kept הַסַּ֜ף <S%H5592><s%> the doors מִיַּ֧ד <S%H3027><s%> of the hand מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim וּמִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> and of all the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin [וְיֹשְׁבֵי כ] (וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H3427><s%> abide ק) יְרֽוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> And they put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> [it] in the hand עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that wrought הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> and the workmen הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> that had the oversight בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> and they gave אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> עוֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> were working הַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> and the workmen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who עֹשִׂים֙ <S%H6213><s%> were working בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִבְדּ֥וֹק <S%H918><s%> to repair וּלְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> and amend הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

וַֽיִּתְּנ֗וּ <S%H5414><s%> gave לֶחָֽרָשִׁים֙ <S%H2796><s%> Even to the artificers וְלַבֹּנִ֔ים <S%H1129><s%> and builders לִקְנוֹת֙ <S%H7069><s%> they [it] to buy אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <S%H4274><s%> hewn וְעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> and timber לַֽמְחַבְּר֑וֹת <S%H4226><s%> for couplings וּלְקָרוֹת֙ <S%H7136><s%> and to floor אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּ֣תִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> the houses אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הִשְׁחִ֖יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> had destroyed מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> which the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <S%H582><s%> And the men עֹשִׂ֨ים <S%H6213><s%> did בֶּאֱמוּנָ֜ה <S%H530><s%> faithfully בַּמְּלָאכָ֗ה <S%H4399><s%> the work וַעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H5921><s%> over מֻ֠פְקָדִים <S%H6485><s%> to set [it] forward יַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> of them [were] Jahath וְעֹבַדְיָ֤הוּ <S%H5662><s%> and Obadiah הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons מְרָרִ֔י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari וּזְכַרְיָ֧ה <S%H2148><s%> and Zechariah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֛ם <S%H4918><s%> and Meshullam מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֖ים <S%H6956><s%> of the sons of the Kohathites לְנַצֵּ֑חַ <S%H5329><s%> and the overseers וְהַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and [other of] the Levites כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מֵבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> all that could skill בִּכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> of instruments שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> of musick

וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over הַסַּבָּלִ֗ים <S%H5449><s%> Also [they were] over the bearers of burdens וּֽמְנַצְּחִים֙ <S%H5329><s%> and [were] overseers לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> of all that wrought מְלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> the work לַעֲבוֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> in any manner of service וַעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> to job וּמֵֽהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and of the Levites סוֹפְרִ֥ים <S%H5608><s%> [there were] scribes וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> and officers וְשׁוֹעֲרִֽים׃ <S%H7778><s%> and porters

וּבְהוֹצִיאָ֣ם <S%H3318><s%> And when they brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> the money הַמּוּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> that was brought into בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> found חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2518><s%> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> a book תּֽוֹרַת־ <S%H8451><s%> of the law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [given] by מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered חִלְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2518><s%> And Hilkiah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁפָ֣ן <S%H8227><s%> to Shaphan הַסּוֹפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe סֵ֧פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law מָצָ֖אתִי <S%H4672><s%> I have found בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> delivered חִלְקִיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2518><s%> And Hilkiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֵּ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁפָֽן׃ <S%H8227><s%> to Shaphan

וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> carried שָׁפָ֤ן <S%H8227><s%> And Shaphan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <S%H5612><s%> the book אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king וַיָּ֨שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> back ע֧וֹד <S%H5750><s%> further אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> word לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> again saying כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> Everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that was נִתַּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> All that was committed בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> to עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> they do
